ihala kothmalen megowot 75 k jathika widuli bala paddhathiyata ekkarayi shiran ranasinha megowot ekasiya panahakin samanwitha ihala kothmale jala widuli balagaraye nipada wu megowot haththapahak pereda (28 wanida) jathika widuli paddhathiyata ek kala bawa athireka samanyadhikari (wyapruthi) shawindra pranandu mahatha "diwayina"ta pawasiya. 2006 wasaredi ihala kothmale jala widuli wyapruthiya aarambha kala athara deshapalana ha paramparika hethun matha megowot 300 k nipadawimata kalin kara thibu salasma wenas kara wyapruthiya megowot ekasiya panahakata sima karana ladi.

emenma kauthukagarayak da ehi sthapitha kere.mema sakachchawa sandaha kotte kalyana samagri dharma maha sangha sabhawe anunayaka iththapana dhammalankara anunahimiyan, ellawala medhananda himiyan, mahacharya bellanwila wimalarathana anuna himiyan pradhana gaurawaniya maha sangharathnaya samangin adhyapana amathya bandula gunawardhana, buddhashasana ha aagamika katayuthu niyojya amathya, em. ke. ee. di. es. gunawardhana yana mahathwarun athulu pirisak ekwa sitiyaha.
